eligibility:
Lateral Entry:
Candidates who have successfully completed the 3 year diploma in Engineering are eligible to apply for lateral entry into engineering programmes.
why_choose: Why choose this course? Industry oriented curriculum Core company job Live industry projects Industry supported laboratory Product development Open air theatre and gazebos for outdoor learning
what_learn: What you will learn? Domain specific and elective courses that covers VLSI, Embedded systems, Signal processing, Cyber and Network Security, IoT, Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. Open and Global elective courses to introduce other engineering specialization and Liberal Arts Projects and internship to accomplish solutions for real world complex problem and understand the operations of Industries. Basic science and engineering science courses to provide foundation for applied and interdisciplinary learning. Ability enhancement courses and Holistic education to provide overall development of the students.
modules: Modules UI/UX Design Cyber Security Year 2 Mathematics for Intelligent Systems Data Structures and Algorithms Electronic Devices and Circuit Analysis Digital Electronics Operating Systems Sustainable Green Technology Database Management Systems Signals and Systems Computer Organization and Architecture Object Oriented Programming with JAVA Professional Ethics Sensors and IoT Computer Vision Year 3 Robotics and Mechatronics Fundamentals of Artificial Intelligence Digital Signal Processing Data Communications and Computer Networks Compiler Design Cyber Physical Systems Project Management and Finance Sensors and IoT Fundamentals of Machine Learning Artificial Intelligence with python Artificial Intelligence in Cyber Security Building AI Systems Global Elective SDG Projects (Service Learning) Constitution of India Elective Courses Internship Year 4 Fundamentals of Deep Learning Project Work
career: Career prospects Opportunities to work in Core and Service based industries Understand the major domains of VLSI and Embedded systems, Communication and Signal processing to choose the career path Provision to work on the research projects of the faculty members Support for interested to become Entrepreneur Sessions and training for competitive exam to pursue Masters and research
